title: Mathematics Reading Proficiency Enhancement Program Using the CBI Model

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical terminology and elementary English reading skills
context.additional_context: A program focused on enhancing mathematics domain English reading skills for working professionals, conducted in smartphone-based constrained environments

learning_goals: Learners can improve explicit information extraction skills by at least 30% over 8 weeks.
Learners can enhance implicit information inference skills by at least 25% over 8 weeks.
Learners can improve text interpretation skills using grammatical/vocabulary cues by at least 20% over 8 weeks.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
